Let them read the word of the Lord, in order that they may have the wisdom that is unto salvation. The richest treasures are to be found by searching for them in the word. Some minds will be so impressed to seek these hidden treasures as to sell all that they have in order to buy the field and come into possession 
                                                                           204
of the priceless jewels of truth. Ofttimes the most lowly are in possession of the hidden treasure which they may impart to others.
